code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';import createSagaMiddleware from"redux-saga";import thunk from'redux-thunk';import{TodoReducer}from"./reducers/TodoReducers";import{myFirstReducer}from"./reducers/data";import mySaga from'./saga/AppSagas';const sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();const reducer=combineReducers({Data:myFirstReducer,Todo:TodoReducer});const initialState={};const middleware=[thunk];const store=createStore(reducer,initialState,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(...middleware),applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware)));sagaMiddleware.run(mySaga);export default store;
